## useAccount variable

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
useAccount: ({ fetchEns }?: Config) => readonly [{
    readonly data: {
        address: string;
        connector: import("wagmi-core").Connector<any, any> | undefined;
        ens: {
            avatar: string | null | undefined;
            name: string;
        } | undefined;
    } | undefined;

}, () => void]
```
